K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138a-0: @138a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138a-1: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138a-2: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa na n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138a-3: aom ki ni ki ni ta th'a ga ta au da bha ba sh'ante ba ra de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138a-4: autta ma autta ma ta th'a ga ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138a-5: aud bha ba h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138b-0: 'di bzung bas 'phags @138b sdong po bkod pa'i mdo thams cad rdzogs par bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138b-2: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138b-3: phyag rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-046:138b-4: 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs so ////
